"I am Mr. Pigeon. I am here to be of guidance
and give you hints how to see different conclusions
to this story, without needing external help."
"This is the white room. It is intended to be unlocked
after you've reached one of the many conclusions of
"It serves as an in-game walkthrough aswell as a teaser
for the extended version of the game."
"This door leads to the bonus room, filled with
extras exclusive to the extended edition."
"...Of course that also means that it can only
be accessed in the extended edition."
"There are 8 endings in this version of the game.
There are two more in the extended version though,
so please purchase it if you are interested!"
"Would you rather have a vague hint and figure the rest
out by yourself? Or do you want one that's more...
on the nose, so to say?"
"Our attachement to the people around us is an important
factor for the decisions we make.
But how do you grow this attachement?"

"Lastly, sometimes it's important to take a moment
and appreciate the people that are in our lifes before
"I hope these hints were helpful at all."

in the house, yet to be opened."

and say goodbye to the people important to us before

they feel too much attachment... or too little."
